data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oliveira, Favizia Freitas de, Engel, Michael S., Mahlmann, Thiago (2012): A new Chlerogelloides from northeastern Brazil and French Guiana, with a key to the species (Hymenoptera, Halictidae). ZooKeys 185: 41-53, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.185.2551, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.185.2551
